document.topic_text: In an effort to "spread peace and love and doing good for the community," the Al-Hoda Islamic Center on Kennedy Boulevard hosted a neighborhood cleanup this afternoon. People of all ages grabbed bags, brooms and gloves to help make the neighborhood a little bit cleaner. Click through the photo gallery above for highlights from today's cleanup.
